Who We Are? 
Sugar, spice and everything nice! MarriageMenu is a team of powerpuff humans, that link their professional expertise to their personal love for weddings.We work at weddings, from weddings, for weddings. So sit back, log on to MarriageMenu, and feed all your whims and fancies!

Photos

Real Weddings 
Every couple has a story to tell, and we have their wedding stories on our Real Weddings section. Inspiration is impulsive, after all. 

Blog

		MarriageMenu - Personal Wedding Planner 

										Plan your wedding with Us
